name: The Social Hotel
description:
/!\ NEW YEARS EVE 2025/2026 /!\

Holiday Reservation Policy (December 22, 2025 – January 5, 2026)
To ensure a smooth experience during the peak holiday season, please take note of the following special reservation conditions:
Full Prepayment Required: All reservations made for stays between December 22, 2025, and January 5, 2026, must be fully prepaid at the time of booking.
Failed Payment: If the payment is unsuccessful or not completed, the reservation will be automatically cancelled.
Minimum Stay Requirement: A minimum stay of 5 consecutive nights is required for bookings within this period.
Any stay during this period has a free cancelation up to 60 days before the check-in, after this period, the full amount will be kept.

Restricted Check-in/Check-out Dates:
No check-ins or check-outs are allowed on December 25th, 31st, 2025, and January 1st, 2026.
Please plan your travel dates accordingly.
We appreciate your understanding and cooperation in adhering to these special holiday terms, if you have any question, please feel free to email us.


Hybrid Hotel
Experience Sydney's latest high quality accommodation. Great high end facilities and designer finishes throughout. 

Our boutique hotels are inspired by the local community and lifestyle, with a vision to bring a sense of place and culture directly into our spaces and to our guests. Brand new beds with privacy, full air conditioning / heating, en-suite bathrooms, free secure lockers.

Enjoy our beautifully designed accommodation with an amazing roof terrace to mingle and meet with other guests and enjoy the stunning views of the Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge. With free internet so you can use our co-working space, join in our weekly activities for recreation / wellness, and local experiences.

Whether you are here to work, play or stay, we have you covered. We have numerous local contacts to help those looking to work and experience life as a local. The Social Hotel offers accommodation in the trendy Darlinghurst district. Free Wi-Fi is available in all rooms and there is common TV room and kitchen / dining room. 

Just 10 minutes’ walk from the city centre, The Social Hotel is a 2-minute walk from the restaurants, bars and nightlife of Kings Cross and a short walk to the bustling Oxford Street nightlife. Trains from Kings Cross to central Sydney depart regularly with the Opera House and Sydney Harbour Bridge being 1 stop away.

-FREE Breakfast daily from 8am to 10am

- Check-in is from 2 PM until late.
If you are planning to arrive earlier, please advise us and we'll do our best to organize something for you.
If no beds are ready in case of early check-in, you can still drop your luggage with us and enjoy the day while the bed is being prepared.
- Check-out time is until 10 AM, and all belonging must be removed by this time, after that, you are welcome to use the storage room to leave your bag.

*Cancellation Policy- 24 Hours Before Check-In time. In case of cancellation or no-show, you will be charged the first night of your stay*
- An international passport or acceptable photo ID must be presented at check-in for all guests. Failure to provide an acceptable ID will mean that you cannot check-in. Youth hostel, guest must have between 18 and 35 years old to stay in our shared bedrooms.

- The stay has to be paid in full at check-in.

- The property is not responsible for your personal belongings, that is your responsibility to keep them safe. Guests are able to leave their luggage in the storage room for a maximum of 24 hours.

- Guests will be expected to reimburse the property for any damages caused by inappropriate behavior during their stay.

- When you book 1 or more dorm beds, we cannot guarantee that your entire group can be in the same dorm room.

- LATE CHECK IN REQUIREMENTS 

- Free breakfast everyday from 8am to 10am

Please contact us directly if you require late check-in between the hours of 6pm - 8am. Guests must send us a copy of their drivers license, passport to our direct email info@thesocialhotel.com.au

If we do not receive valid ID prior to your arrival, your booking will be canceled.

Please be aware, there is an age restriction of 18 - 35 years old for all shared rooms (no age restriction for private rooms). 

A message will be sent to you 1 day before your due to check-in with some information about The Social Hotel Sydney.

Proof of ID will be required for all accommodation, if you are unable to prove your age, your reservation may be cancelled.

Safety cameras are used throughout the premises, and anyone on our property may be recorded.
Any photos and videos captured in house/during social activities can be used by us.

houseRules.notes:
Youth hostel - guest must be 18 to 35 years old.

All cancellations for standard bookings must be made at least 24 hours before the latest check in time.

/!\ NEW YEARS EVE 2025/2026 /!\

Holiday Reservation Policy (December 27, 2025 – January 3, 2026)
To ensure a smooth experience during the peak holiday season, please take note of the following special reservation conditions:
Full Prepayment Required: All reservations made for stays between December 27, 2025, and January 3, 2026, must be fully prepaid at the time of booking.
Failed Payment: If the payment is unsuccessful or not completed, the reservation will be automatically cancelled.
Minimum Stay Requirement: A minimum stay of 7 consecutive nights is required for bookings within this period.

/!\ Stay covring December 31st, 2025 and January 1st, 2026 is non-refundable /!\


If a guest no shows for their reservation, the property has the authority to charge the guests card up to the cost of the first night's stay.

Standard Cancellation Policy: If you cancel under 72 hours before your arrival date (i.e. the day before) a one-night cancellation fee is incurred. You can cancel before that time without charge.

Travel insurance is recommended.

We cannot guarantee that groups booking dorms will be in the same room.

PLEASE NOTE: For dorm bookings, we require a valid overseas passport.

No sleeping bags or your own linen permitted for use.

Note: all bookings require valid government-issued photo ID. All card payments (EFTPOS, Mastercard, Visa etc.) incur a 1% surcharge.

Things to Note
Check-In / Check-Out Policies
• Check-In: 2:00 pm
• Check-Out: 10:00 am
• Late Check-Out: 2:00 pm
• Late Check-Out Fees: 100%

Special Check-In Instructions
For check-ins after reception working hours, please contact our Night Manager, by the time you arrive at our property.
We always do our best to accommodate our guests before check-in time. However, if the room is not ready, we have a luggage room in which you can store your belongings for free.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS
General Information
• Check-In: You must be over the age of 18 years and hold a valid passport and photo ID document will be requested upon check-in (such as a valid driver's licence, proof of age card or passport)
• Check-Out: Is 10 am. Penalties apply if you stay past this time
• Extensions: Looking to extending your stay? Let reception know at the LATEST the night before the check-out date. We will do our best to extend your stay subject to the required availability
• Group Bookings: More than 6 people must call reception between 9 am - 7 pm daily to check room availability and policies.We do not take bookings for sporting trips, bucks / hens parties or any other party.
• Smoking: Social Hotel is a smoke-free property.
• Suggestion: We suggest anyone 35+ years old book, one of our twin or double rooms.

A refundable comprehensive deposit MUST be paid at check-in and when checking out the following conditions must apply:
1. Room key card must be returned. Lost or broken key cards will be charged AUD $5.
2. Guests must pay a security deposit of AUD $50 which is refunded at check-out.
3. No sleeping bags are to be used in the rooms.
4. Please be considerate to other guests and contain your belongings in the storage provided only.
5. Late room charges/rent payments will be charged to your credit card unless alternative arrangements have pre-organised with reception.
6. Early cancellation of in-house guest reservations must be made 48 hours (two days) prior to your new departure date or two night's room penalty rate will be charged.
7. If you are locked out of your room after reception hours, there is a Night Manager fee of AUD $10 for recurrent situations.
8. If you lose your key, it will only cost you AUD $5 for a new one.
9. If you don't hand in your linen at the end of your stay, it will cost you your full $70 security deposit.
10. If you are responsible for setting off the fire alarm, you will be charged $2,200 fee.
11. If you damage any part of the Social Hotel property or items provided to you by Social Hotel, you will be charged the full costs incurred to fix the damage caused.
12. Any member of Social Hotel may ask you to leave the property at any time for any reason however in particular for any of these reasons: illegal drugs; fighting; property damage; smoking inside of the room; breaking into the kitchen, courtyard or other people's rooms. You will not receive any refund from your booking payment or key deposit.
